member.name: M:Protocol.Skyline.Protocol.Library.ProtocolDCF.DcfHelper.GetInterfaces(System.Boolean,Protocol.Skyline.Protocol.Library.ProtocolDCF.DcfInterfaceFilter[])
member.summary:
Gets DCF Interfaces using DcfInterfaceFilter objects to identify a unique interface. This method caches the previously retrieved Interfaces in the background and will not retrieve the interfaces again unless the refresh bool is set to true.
Returns: An array with DcfInterfaceResult Objects in the same order as the requested UIDS, if an Interface (or interfaces) was not found then this DcfInterfaceResult will be null! Be sure to check for 'null' values before using a result!
member.param: Set To True if you want to force this method to perform a protocol.GetAllInterfaces and refresh it's internal Cache.
One or more DcfInterfaceFilter objects that identify a unique interface (can be both internal, external or a mix of both)
member.returns: An array with DcfInterfaceResult Objects in the same order as the requested UIDS, if an Interface (or interfaces) was not found then this DcfInterfaceResult will be null! Be sure to check for 'null' values before using a result!

member.name: M:Protocol.Skyline.Protocol.Library.ProtocolDCF.DcfHelper.GetInterfaces(Protocol.Skyline.Protocol.Library.ProtocolDCF.DcfInterfaceFilter[])
member.summary:
Gets DCF Interfaces using DcfInterfaceFilter structs to identify a unique interface. This method caches the previously retrieved Interfaces in the background and will not retrieve the interfaces again unless the refresh bool is set to true.
Returns: An array with DCFDynamicLinkResult Objects in the same order as the requested UIDS, if an Interface (or interfaces) was not found then this DcfInterfaceResult will be null!
member.param: Set To True if you want to force this method to perform a protocol.GetAllInterfaces and refresh it's internal Cache.
One or more DcfInterfaceFilter structs that identify a unique interface (can be both internal, external or a mix of both)
member.returns: An array with DCFDynamicLinkResult Objects in the same order as the requested UIDS, if an Interface (or interfaces) was not found then this DcfInterfaceResult will be null!

member.summary:
Gets a single ConnectivityInterface based on a single filter.
Returns: A single ConnectivityInterface object, returns Null if not found.
member.param: Filter used to find the interface
Indicates if it should forcibly refresh the internal cache of interfaces
member.returns: A single ConnectivityInterface object, returns Null if not found.

member.name: M:Protocol.Skyline.Protocol.Library.ProtocolDCF.DcfHelper.GetInterfaces(Protocol.Skyline.Protocol.Library.ProtocolDCF.DcfInterfaceFilterMulti,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Gets a collection of ConnectivityInterfaces based on a filter.
Returns: Multiple ConnectivityInterfaces matching the filter. Returns Null if none where found.
member.param: Filter used to find the interfaces
Indicates if it should forcibly refresh the internal cache of interfaces
member.returns: Multiple ConnectivityInterfaces matching the filter. Returns Null if none where found.

member.name: M:Protocol.Skyline.Protocol.Library.ProtocolDCF.DcfHelper.GetConnections(System.Boolean,Protocol.Skyline.Protocol.Library.ProtocolDCF.DcfConnectionFilter[])
member.summary:
GetConnections allows the retrieval of connections based on DCFConnectionFilters using an internal cache.
Returns: An array of DCFConnectionResult objects in the same order as the requests. If one of the filter found nothing, that resultObject will be Null. Make sure to check for this.
member.param: Forces the refresh of the internal cache
member.returns: An array of DCFConnectionResult objects in the same order as the requests. If one of the filter found nothing, that resultObject will be Null. Make sure to check for this.

member.name: M:Protocol.Skyline.Protocol.Library.ProtocolDCF.DcfHelper.GetConnections(Protocol.Skyline.Protocol.Library.ProtocolDCF.DcfConnectionFilter[])
member.summary:
GetConnections allows the retrieval of connections based on DCFConnectionFilters using an internal cache.
Returns: An array of DCFConnectionResult objects in the same order as the requests. If one of the filter found nothing, that resultObject will be Null. Make sure to check for this.
member.returns: An array of DCFConnectionResult objects in the same order as the requests. If one of the filter found nothing, that resultObject will be Null. Make sure to check for this.

member.name: M:Protocol.Skyline.Protocol.Library.ProtocolDCF.DcfHelper.GetConnections(Protocol.Skyline.Protocol.Library.ProtocolDCF.DcfConnectionFilter)
member.summary:
GetConnections allows the retrieval of connections based on DCFConnectionFilters using an internal cache.
Returns: An array of ConnectivityConnection objects in the same order as the requests. If the filter found nothing, the returned array will be Null. Make sure to check for this.
member.param: One DCFConnectionFilter objects where you expect one or more ConnectivityConnections as a result.
member.returns: An array of ConnectivityConnection objects in the same order as the requests. If the filter found nothing, the returned array will be Null. Make sure to check for this.

member.name: M:Protocol.Skyline.Protocol.Library.ProtocolDCF.DcfHelper.GetConnection(Protocol.Skyline.Protocol.Library.ProtocolDCF.DcfConnectionFilter)
member.summary:
GetConnections allows the retrieval of connections based on DCFConnectionFilters using an internal cache.
Returns: A single ConnectivityConnection object that matches your request. Returns Null if no connection was found matching the filter.
member.param: One DCFConnectionFilter objects where you expect one ConnectivityConnection object as a result.
member.returns: A single ConnectivityConnection object that matches your request. Returns Null if no connection was found matching the filter.

member.name: M:Protocol.Skyline.Protocol.Library.ProtocolDCF.DcfHelper.SaveConnections(System.Boolean,Protocol.Skyline.Protocol.Library.ProtocolDCF.DcfSaveConnectionRequest[])
member.summary:
This method is used to save both internal and external connections.
Returns: One or more DCFSaveConnectionResults in the same order as the DCFSaveConnectionRequests. If a Connection fails to get created or if you use Async then the connections inside the DCFSaveConnectionResult will be null.
member.param: Indicates if the cache of Connections needs to be refreshed (performs a protocol.GetConnectivityConnections() in the background)
One or more DCFSaveConnectionRequest objects that define the connection you wish to save
member.returns: One or more DCFSaveConnectionResults in the same order as the DCFSaveConnectionRequests. If a Connection fails to get created or if you use Async then the connections inside the DCFSaveConnectionResult will be null.

This method is used to save both internal and external connections.

member.param: One or more DCFSaveConnectionRequest objects that define the connection you wish to save
member.returns: One or more DCFSaveConnectionResults in the same order as the DCFSaveConnectionRequests. If a Connection fails to get created or if you use Async then the connections inside the DCFSaveConnectionResult will be null.
